title: Wrongfully suspended? Help!
body: I usually play 1-2 LoL games a day with a couple of friends and we almost always have some fun games. However this morning I received an email saying I received a disciplinary action suspension on my LoL account. I thought this was another one of those scam emails so I booted up lol and tried to log in. Sure enough I am suspended. I went back to the email and all it says is I violated something in the ToS, no specifics were given. I have not left any matches or harassed anyone so I have no clue as to why I am banned? Is there anyway I can contact staff and get this resolved?

replies.body:
As Mindstar said, sending in a ticket will get down to the source of why this happened most effectively.

But we can analyse it a bit here. Are you the only person who plays on your account?

Hi,

I'd suggest you get in touch with the support team directly (go to the "support" link top right of this site, and click "submit a request").  They should be able to help clarify the situation for you.

Cheers
Mindstar
